questions.question: Rewrite the sentence in passive voice: 'The cat ate the mouse.'
options: The mouse was eaten by the cat.
The cat is eating the mouse.
questions.correctAnswer: The mouse was eaten by the cat.
questions.explanation: In passive voice, the object of the action becomes the subject of the sentence.

questions.question: Rewrite the sentence in passive voice: 'The chef cooked a delicious meal.'
options: A delicious meal was cooked by the chef.
The chef is cooking a delicious meal.
A delicious meal cooks the chef.
The chef cooks a delicious meal.
questions.correctAnswer: A delicious meal was cooked by the chef.
questions.explanation: In passive voice, the focus is on the meal rather than the chef.

questions.question: Choose the correct form of the verb: 'She _____ (write) a letter.'
questions.explanation: The present perfect tense is used to describe an action that occurred at an unspecified time and has relevance to the present.

questions.question: Complete the sentence: 'They _____ (finish) their homework before dinner.'
questions.explanation: Present perfect tense is used to indicate that an action has been completed before another point in time.
